#Summary1=(human1) On September 12, 2015, at least 107 people were killed and 238 wounded at Mecca's Grand Mosque in Saudi Arabia when a storm caused a construction crane to collapse just ten days before the beginning of the Hajj, Islam's annual pilgrimage to Mecca.

#Summary2=(claude-3-5-sonnet-20241022) A construction crane at Mecca's Grand Mosque collapsed during a storm, killing at least 107 people and injuring 238 just days before the annual Hajj pilgrimage, while the mosque was undergoing expansion work to improve crowd control.

#Summary3=(gpt4o) A crane collapse at Mecca's Grand Mosque on September 12, 2015, killed 107 and injured 238 just ten days before the Hajj pilgrimage; The accident, reported by Saudi Arabia's Civil Defense, underscores ongoing construction efforts to improve crowd control during the significant Muslim religious event.

#Summary4=(Llama-3.2-3B-Instruct) A crane collapsed into Mecca's Grand Mosque on September 12, 2015, killing at least 107 people and wounding 238, due to strong winds and heavy rain, just ten days before the start of the Hajj pilgrimage.
#Summary5=(Qwen2.5-7B-Instruct) A storm caused a crane to collapse in Mecca's Grand Mosque, resulting in at least 107 deaths and 238 injuries, occurring just before the start of the Hajj pilgrimage.
#Text=At least 107 killed in Mecca crane collapse
#Text=Saturday , September 12 , 2015
#Text=pilgrims at Mecca 's Grand Mosque in 2008 .
#Text=A storm yesterday caused a crane to fall into Mecca 's Grand Mosque , killing 107 or more and wounding 238 , according to Saudi Arabia 's Civil Defense Authority .

#Text=Civil Defense Authority director General Suleiman al - Amr , in remarks to al - Ikhbariya television , said " All those who were wounded and the dead have been taken to hospital . There are no casualties left at the location . "
#Text=The accident , which occurred yesterday afternoon , was caused by strong winds and heavy rain that led the crane to fall .
#Text=Photos released of the scene showed numerous bloodied bodies and various scattered debris .
#Text=The accident occurred at a time when the mosque was relatively uncrowded .
#Text=" Had it happened an hour later it would have been much worse , " Khaled Al - Maeena , editor at large at the Saudi Gazette , said .
#Text=" Had it happened five hours earlier or four hours earlier , I think the death toll would have been more than a thousand . "
#Text=The crane accident comes just ten days before the beginning of the Hajj , the annual pilgrimage to Mecca , Islam 's holiest site .
#Text=As undergoing a pilgrimage to Mecca is a mandatory religious duty for all Muslims who physically and financially can , millions of pilgrims arrive in Mecca each year for the Hajj .
#Text=Construction was underway at the mosque in order to enlarge the mosque and improve crowd control , which has been a recurring problem during Mecca 's pilgrimages .
